dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6058 IH: Interagency Committee on Women’s Business Enterprise Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Meng (for herself and Ms. Salazar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Interagency Committee on Women’s Business Enterprise, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Interagency Committee on Women’s Business Enterprise Act of 2023.

section.header: Interagency Committee on Women’s Business Enterprise
section.text: Title IV of the Women’s Business Ownership Act of 1988 (15 U.S.C. 7101 et seq.) is amended—

clause.text: by redesignating paragraphs (3) and (4) as paragraphs (2) and (3), respectively; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: monitor the plans, programs, and operations of the departments and agencies of the Federal Government to identify barriers to new business formation by women entrepreneurs, or barriers experienced by women-led startups in accessing and participating in the plans, programs, and operations of the departments and agencies of the Federal Government.

subparagraph.text: in subsection (b), by inserting after the first sentence the following: In addition to the meetings described in the preceding sentence, the Interagency Committee shall meet at the call of the executive director of the Council or the chairperson of the Interagency Committee.; and
in subsection (c), in the first sentence, by inserting , including through the use of published research and policy independently developed by the Council after Council;

subclause.text: in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by inserting the Administrator, the executive director of the Council, and before 1 representative; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
The Office of Management and Budget.
The Office of the Assistant Secretary for Indian Affairs of the Department of the Interior.

subclause.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking Small Business Administration Reauthorization Act of 1997 and inserting Interagency Committee on Women’s Business Enterprise Act of 2023; and

item.text: by striking and shall report directly to the Administrator on the status of the activities on the Interagency Committee; and
by striking National Women’s Business Council established under section 405 and inserting Council; and

subparagraph.text: by amending subsection (b) to read as follows:

paragraph.text: Not later than 45 days after the date of the enactment of this subsection, the President, in consultation with the Administrator, shall appoint one of the members of the Interagency Committee to serve as chairperson.

If a chairperson is not appointed during the 45-day period described in paragraph (1), the Deputy Administrator of the Small Business Administration shall serve as acting chairperson of the Interagency Committee until a chairperson is appointed under paragraph (1).

subparagraph.text: in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by striking 1995 and inserting 2024;
in paragraph (1), by adding and at the end;
in paragraph (2), by striking ; and and inserting a period; and
in paragraph (5), by inserting and after the semicolon; and

clause.text: in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by inserting and Entrepreneurship before of the Senate; and
in subparagraph (A), by striking council and inserting Council.
